localhost.controllers

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • localhost.controllers.BaseController
      • localhost.controllers.DatabaseController

  • public final class DatabaseController
extends BaseController
    This class lists all the endpoints of the groups.

                          throws ApiException,

        Note: This endpoint is applicable only for on-prem deployments To list all the databases in Falcon, use this endpoint.

        Returns the List of String response from the API call
